description: specs for fronius register as int

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Delete_Data
devicefields.note: Delete stored ratings of the current inverter by writing 0xFFFF.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Store_Data
devicefields.note: Rating data of all inverters connected to the Fronius Datamanager are persistently stored by writing 0xFFFF.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Active_State_Code
devicefields.note: Current active state code of inverter - Description can be found in inverter manual

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Reset_All_Event_Flags
devicefields.note: Write 0xFFFF to reset all event flags and active state code.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_ModelType
devicefields.note: Type of SunSpec models used for inverter and meter data. Write 1 or 2 and then immediately 6 to acknowledge setting.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Storage_Restrictions_View_Mode
devicefields.note: Type of Restrictions reported in BasicStorageControl Model (IC124). Local restrictions are those that are set by Modbus Interface. Global restrictions are those that are set system wide.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Site_Power
devicefields.note: Total power (site sum) of all connected inverters.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Site_Energy_Day
devicefields.note: Total energy for current day of all connected inverters.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Site_Energy_Year
devicefields.note: Total energy for last year of all connected inverters.

devicefields.name: FRONIUS_F_Site_Energy_Total
devicefields.note: Total energy of all connected inverters.
